üß™ Test Instructions

Audio Testing

  1. Click play on the primary audio stream
  2. Verify you can hear NRG Radio audio
  3. Test the backup stream if primary fails
  4. Check volume controls work properly

Video Testing

  1. Check if the video player loads correctly
  2. Verify the iframe displays the NRG Radio player
  3. Test fullscreen functionality
  4. Check if video controls are accessible
